description: For an eye-catching and fresh side, try this crunchy wedge green salad. It's full of veggies and herbs, and topped off with a creamy buttermilk dressing.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Bonus,Gluten free,Green salad,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Dec 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Wedge Green Salad With Peas, Cucumber & Mint Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook peas in a small saucepan of boiling water for 1 minute or until bright green and just tender. Drain and refresh in a bowl of iced water. Drain.
Arrange lettuce, peas, baby cucumbers and mint on a platter.
Whisk buttermilk, vinegar and chives in a small bowl. Drizzle over salad. Season with pepper and serve with lemon cheeks.
